body_html:
In this problem solved?

I am using the latest version 0.7.1, which supports cuda 7.5.
I tried out all the above proposed suggestions, but none of them worked...

I would like to get tensorflow work on centos 6.7. Directly installing tensorflow on the system has the glibc problem #527

So I turned to docker and it leads to the current problem.

Any other suggestions on how to get it work?

body:
In this problem solved?

I am using the latest version `0.7.1`, which supports `cuda 7.5`.
I tried out all the above proposed suggestions, but none of them worked...

I would like to get tensorflow work on `centos 6.7`. Directly installing tensorflow on the system has the glibc problem #527 

So I turned to docker and it leads to the current problem.

Any other suggestions on how to get it work?
